00049         //Create a SRPP Message with the data and encrypt it and return it
00050         SRPPMessage create_and_encrypt_srpp(string data, CryptoProfile * crypto, SRPPSession* srpp_session){
00051 
00052                 //create a buffer
00053                 unsigned char buff[65536];
00054                 //create the message
00055                 SRPPMessage* srpp_msg = new SRPPMessage(buff);
00056 
00057                 //put data, if any, in the payload
00058                 if(!data.empty())
00059                         data.copy((srpp_msg->encrypted_part.original_payload),data.length(),0);
00060 
00061 
00062                 //encrypt the message
00063                 *srpp_msg = encrypt_srpp(srpp_msg, crypto,srpp_session);
00064 
00065                 return *srpp_msg;
00066 
00067         }

00083         // Encrypt the given SRPP packet
00084         SRPPMessage encrypt_srpp(
00085                         SRPPMessage * original_pkt,
00086                         CryptoProfile * crypto,
00087                         SRPPSession * srpp_session)
00088         {
00089                 //TODO::: USE CRYPTO
00090 
00091                 SRPPEncrypted * to_encrypt = &(original_pkt->encrypted_part);
00092 
00093                 //Encrypt the "encrypted_part" of the SRPP Packet.
00094         //              cout << "DATA:" << to_encrypt->original_payload << endl;
00095 
00096                 //encrypt each unsigned int part with the key from the session
00097                 unsigned int * orig = reinterpret_cast<unsigned int *>(to_encrypt);
00098                 int i = 0;
00099                 for (i = 0;i<= (sizeof(*to_encrypt)/sizeof(unsigned int));i++)
00100                 {
00101                         (*(orig+i)) ^= srpp_session->encryption_key;
00102                 }
00103 
00104 //              cout << "ENCRYPTED DATA:" << to_encrypt->original_payload << endl;
00105 
00106                 return *original_pkt;
00107 
00108         }
